languages.text:
Под влиянием негативных эффектов шансы вашего персонажа на выживание снижаются: он может получить {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафы{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыкам{/g} или действиям или же периодический прямой урон каждый ход.
Когда персонаж подвержен какому-либо эффекту, рядом с его портретом появляется соответствующий значок.
Негативные эффекты бывают общие и уникальные.

Under the influence of negative effects, your character's chances of survival are reduced: they receive {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, or actions, and may also suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
When a character is subject to any {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}, a corresponding icon will appear next to their portrait.
There are two broad categories of negative effects: common and unique.
languages.original_text:
Под влиянием негативных эффектов шансы вашего персонажа на выживание снижаются: он может получить {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафы{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыкам{/g} или действиям или же периодический прямой урон каждый ход.
Когда персонаж подвержен какому-либо эффекту, рядом с его портретом появляется соответствующий значок.
Негативные эффекты бывают общие и уникальные.

traits.locale_text:
Under the influence of negative effects, your character's chances of survival are reduced: they receive penalties to their characteristics, skills, or actions.
When a character is subject to any effect, a corresponding icon will appear next to their portrait.
There are two broad categories of negative effects: common and unique.

Under the influence of negative effects, your character's chances of survival are reduced: they receive penalties to their characteristics, skills, or actions.
When a character is subject to any effect, a corresponding icon will appear next to their portrait.
There are two broad categories of negative effects: common and unique.

Under the influence of negative effects, your character's chances of survival are reduced: they receive penalties to their characteristics, skills, or actions, and may also suffer direct damage each turn.
When a character is subject to any effect, a corresponding icon will appear next to their portrait.
There are two broad categories of negative effects: common and unique.

Under the influence of negative effects, your character's chances of survival are reduced: they receive {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, or actions, and may also suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
When a character is subject to any {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}, a corresponding icon will appear next to their portrait.
There are two broad categories of negative effects: common and unique.

Under the influence of negative effects, your character's chances of survival are reduced: they receive {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, or actions, and may also suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
When a character is subject to any {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}, a corresponding icon will appear next to their portrait.
There are two broad categories of negative effects: common and unique.

languages.text:
マイナス効果の影響下にある時、貴方のキャラクターの生存率は低下し、{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}、行動に{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受け、毎{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を受けることもある。
キャラクターが何らかの{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を受けると、肖像画の横に対応するアイコンが表示される。
マイナス効果は、一般的なものと特殊なものの2つに大きく分けられる。
languages.original_text:
Under the influence of negative effects, your character's chances of survival are reduced: they receive {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, or actions, and may also suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
When a character is subject to any {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}, a corresponding icon will appear next to their portrait.
There are two broad categories of negative effects: common and unique.

traits.locale_text:
マイナス効果の影響下にある時、あなたのキャラクターの生存率は低下し、特性やスキル、行動にペナルティを受け、毎ターン直接的なダメージを受けることもある。
キャラクターが何らかの効果を受けると、肖像画の横に対応するアイコンが表示される。
マイナス効果は、一般的なものと特殊なものの2つに大きく分けられる。

languages.text:
当角色受到负面效果影响时，角色在战斗中存活下来的几率会更低，他们的{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}与行动会承受各种各样的{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}效果，每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}可能还会承受{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}。
当角色受到任何{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}影响时，该角色的肖像旁边会出现相应图标。
负面效果分为两类：常规负面效果与独特负面效果。
languages.original_text:
Under the influence of negative effects, your character's chances of survival are reduced: they receive {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, or actions, and may also suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
When a character is subject to any {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}, a corresponding icon will appear next to their portrait.
There are two broad categories of negative effects: common and unique.

traits.locale_text:
在负面效果的影响下，角色在战斗中存活下来的几率会更低，他们的属性、技能与行动会承受各种各样的减值效果，每回合可能还会承受伤害。
当角色受到任何效果影响时，该角色的肖像旁边会出现相应图标。
负面效果分为两类：常规负面效果与独特负面效果。

languages.text:
Cuando tus personajes sufren efectos negativos, sus probabilidades de supervivencia se reducen, ya que reciben {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalizaciones{/g} a sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades{/g} o acciones y posiblemente también {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
Cuando un personaje está sujeto a cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g}, aparece el icono correspondiente junto a su retrato.
Hay dos categorías generales de efectos negativos: comunes y únicos.
languages.original_text:
Under the influence of negative effects, your character's chances of survival are reduced: they receive {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, or actions, and may also suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
When a character is subject to any {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}, a corresponding icon will appear next to their portrait.
There are two broad categories of negative effects: common and unique.

traits.locale_text:
Cuando tus personajes sufren efectos negativos, sus probabilidades de supervivencia se reducen, ya que reciben penalizaciones a sus características, habilidades o acciones y posiblemente también daño cada turno.
Cuando un personaje está sujeto a cualquier efecto, aparece el icono correspondiente junto a su retrato.
Hay dos categorías generales de efectos negativos: comunes y únicos.

languages.text:
Unter dem Einfluss von negativen Effekten werden die Überlebenschancen deines Charakters verringert: Er erhält {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzüge{/g} auf seine {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g} oder Aktionen und kann außerdem jeden {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g} erleiden.
Wenn ein Charakter von einem {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekt{/g} betroffen ist, erscheint ein entsprechendes Symbol neben seinem Porträt.
Man unterscheidet zwischen zwei Hauptkategorien von negativen Effekten: gewöhnlich und einzigartig.
languages.original_text:
Under the influence of negative effects, your character's chances of survival are reduced: they receive {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, or actions, and may also suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
When a character is subject to any {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}, a corresponding icon will appear next to their portrait.
There are two broad categories of negative effects: common and unique.

traits.locale_text:
Unter dem Einfluss von negativen Effekten werden die Überlebenschancen deines Charakters verringert: Er erhält Abzüge auf seine Eigenschaften, Fertigkeiten oder Aktionen und kann außerdem jeden Zug Direktschaden erleiden.
Wenn ein Charakter von einem Effekt betroffen ist, erscheint ein entsprechendes Symbol neben seinem Porträt.
Man unterscheidet zwischen zwei Hauptkategorien von negativen Effekten: gewöhnlich und einzigartig.

languages.text:
Lorsque votre personnage est sous l'influence d'effets négatifs, ses chances de survie sont réduites : des {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalités{/g} s'appliquent à ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g}, à ses {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétences{/g} ou à ses actions, et il peut subir des {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
Lorsqu'un personnage est frappé par un {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g}, l'icône correspondante s'affiche en regard de son portrait.
Il existe deux grandes catégories d'effets négatifs : les effets communs et les effets uniques.
languages.original_text:
Under the influence of negative effects, your character's chances of survival are reduced: they receive {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, or actions, and may also suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
When a character is subject to any {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}, a corresponding icon will appear next to their portrait.
There are two broad categories of negative effects: common and unique.

traits.locale_text:
Lorsque votre personnage est sous l'influence d'effets négatifs, ses chances de survie sont réduites : des pénalités s'appliquent à ses caractéristiques, à ses compétences ou à ses actions, et il peut subir des dégâts directs à chaque tour.
Lorsqu'un personnage est frappé par un effet, l'icône correspondante s'affiche en regard de son portrait.
Il existe deux grandes catégories d'effets négatifs : les effets communs et les effets uniques.

languages.text:
Olumsuz etkilere uğrayan karakterinin sağ kalma olasılığı düşer. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Nitelik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}yetenek{/g} veya eylemlerine {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} alır. Ayrıca her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasara{/g} maruz kalabilir.
Bir karakter herhangi bir {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}etkiye{/g} maruz kaldığında, portresinin yanında o etkiye ait simge belirir.
Olumsuz etkilerin iki ana kategorisi bulunur: Yaygın ve eşsiz.
languages.original_text:
Under the influence of negative effects, your character's chances of survival are reduced: they receive {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, or actions, and may also suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
When a character is subject to any {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}, a corresponding icon will appear next to their portrait.
There are two broad categories of negative effects: common and unique.
